title: Looking for some older players 25+ to make a team with.
body:
Not too fussed about skill level. As long as you know how to play!
Hang out in skype have a beer or two and play some 5's.
Anyone interested shout at me ingame or on here.

Ingame - Ranc

Cheers.

replies.body: I would play but im not 25(Over 20 though)
Same here, I am a bit older as I play with my son sometimes. I am very casual. Add me if you want.
Any specific days or just nytime?
Nothing overly specific just yet. Want to see if there's anyone interested firstly!
